trans-unit.source: « What ties us to territory is tax. » – Kevin Deldycke, 2014-11-07
trans-unit.target: « What ties us to territory is tax. » – Kevin Deldycke, 2014-11-07

trans-unit.source: Don’t get me wrong, this work is a huge undertaking. Postal address parsing, normalization and rendering is hard. See the collection of falsehoods programmers believe about postal addresses.
trans-unit.target: Don’t get me wrong, this work is a huge undertaking. Postal address parsing, normalization and rendering is hard. See the collection of falsehoods programmers believe about postal addresses.

trans-unit.source: Parse, normalize and render postal addresses.
trans-unit.target: Parse, normalize and render postal addresses.

trans-unit.source: Python module to parse, normalize and render postal addresses.
trans-unit.target: Python module to parse, normalize and render postal addresses.

trans-unit.source: The reason above is why we need fine-grained and meticulous territory management and normalization. This project aims to solve this problem once for all.
trans-unit.target: The reason above is why we need fine-grained and meticulous territory management and normalization. This project aims to solve this problem once for all.

trans-unit.source: This library is still in its early stages, but is good enough to implement the new European Directives on VAT, which requires all e-commerce shops to guess the locality of their EU customers depending on their billing address.
trans-unit.target: This library is still in its early stages, but is good enough to implement the new European Directives on VAT, which requires all e-commerce shops to guess the locality of their EU customers depending on their billing address.
